chatgpt.aiResponding.description: Displayed when the AI is generating a response.

chatgpt.conversationStats.description: Displayed to show the number of times the user asked a question and total words used, e.g., 'asked 3 times | 150 words'.

chatgpt.startNewConversation.description: Displayed when the user is starting a new conversation.

chatgpt.talkingWithAI.description: Displayed when the user is engaging in a conversation with the AI.

chatgpt.thinkingOfPrompt.description: Displayed when the user is thinking of a new prompt.
